scripts.start-api:dev: ENVIRONMENT=development IS_LOCAL=1 dotenv -e .env.development.local -e .env.development -- tsx watch -r tsconfig-paths/register ./app.local
scripts.start-api:staging: ENVIRONMENT=staging IS_LOCAL=1 dotenv -e .env.staging.local -e .env.staging -- tsx watch -r tsconfig-paths/register ./app.local
scripts.start-api:prod: ENVIRONMENT=production IS_LOCAL=1 dotenv -e .env.production.local -e .env.production -- tsx watch -r tsconfig-paths/register ./app.local
